concept.title: Define a Data Source
concept.shortdesc: Define a data source on theData Sources page.

conbody.p: Before defining a data source, you must configure the following:
Your users must include at least one and at least one user with a role of .
To be able to configure users, you must first configure user authorizations. If you are applying an access policy to the data source, you must first configure the access policies.

You first define a data source, only the Data Policy screen is available to you. Define the data policy and save it. When you re-open the data source information, the Data Processing Function and Ingest Data tabs become available to you.
